extendedInfo.description: Use Phone Camera as A Painting/Portrait/Photo Frame Level Assistant and a Live Protractor Function!The Self Levelling (and adjustable) Painting/Portrait Frame Assisting System Technology (aka SLAPFAST) helps you fix those oddly angled frames! Don't let those paintings/photo frames ever be at a strange angle again!Also includes, a Live 360Â° Protractor which indicates in degrees. Pretty Handy Tool.Just implemented the new Android Market Licensing System. Do let me know of any errors and I'll endeavour to fix them ASAP. If you have any suggestions, feel free to drop me a mail!Planned Features for Future Releases:-Adjustable Frame Size-Adjustable Colours for Protractor and Frame Level-Adjustable Arm for Custom Measurements-Radian Angle Display

reviews.title: FANTASTIC!
reviews.comment: A life saver of a tool! Soo cool. And don\'t listen to the bad reviews, you HAVE to have the angles stationary to properly assessment the angle.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Never use it
reviews.comment: It always force closes and it seemed like a good app but it always breaks down
reviews.author: May Domingo

reviews.title: Need revision
reviews.comment: Having those degrees stationary doesn\'t give the app much use. Sorry.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good enough
reviews.comment: Exactly what i am looking for, except i need more resolution. Perhaps add resolution settings. I mean degree resolution by that.
reviews.author: Fandi Susanto

reviews.title: Poo
reviews.comment: Every time I try to go in it it just force closes on me
reviews.author: Katie Clewer
